entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 07:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C

Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
